ygData.subject: Re: I know how to get three of the lenses.
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw that gnome he was in the erudide prison way down below in the palace he was imprisond because he tried to smuggle erud s potion out of erud (his story)
ygData.messageBody:
I saw that gnome he was in the erudide prison way down below in the palace
he was imprisond because he tried to smuggle erud's potion out of erud (his
story) to help a sick erudite.
----- Original Message -----
From: Joshua Bednarz <thewhitemage@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 11:04 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] I know how to get three of the lenses.


> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> Yes, you do in fact haev to kill the gnomes that tell you to come back in
a
> few weeks. I read on a site that that someone got three of the lenses one
> fron the dark elf and two from killing the gnomes that tell you to come
back
> in a few weeks. This is only what he said, so it looks like we will have
to
> kill some of our own brethren to get the quest done. But it's still that
one
> last lens thats missing. I also heard that someone saw Bidl Frugrin in the
> clutches of the evil Erudites in thier palace. I'm going to check it out
> soon and make a new character and see.
>
>
